This is a pro-bono volunteer position.JerseySTEM is looking for talented professionals across our departments to commit time and energy as long-term engagement for our mission to provide STEM education to underrepresented middle school girls.The Deputy Head of Data Analytics Department supports and collaborates with the Data Analytics Head and is responsible for coordinating the research, collection and organization of information related to schools, colleges or corporations, stored in spreadsheets and databases.Interview candidates for data collection roles and decide who to onboardAssign tasks with clear instructions to the volunteersMonitor progress of the data collectionProvide Quality ControlGenuine concern about/interest in solving the STEM education gender gapResourceful, can-do attitudeFamiliarity with web browsers and google and google sheetsExperience managing others
